entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -24.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Airport 11:00 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 73 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023
